pros: The geometric design looks great and is very sturdy
This tiny terrarium can fit a few small plants and decorations
Measures 6.89" x 6.89" x 5.9" and is available in three colors
cons: This terrarium is extremely small, making it challenging to arrange plants

customer_reviews.title: Awesome terrarium for a little fairy garden!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore this terrarium! I used it for a bunch of small cacti, succulents, and Tillandsia air plants, and it looks like a little fairy garden! This terrarium gets compliments all the time from house guests. The terrarium was also shipped with a free tiny owl, which made my day, as owls are my favorite bird. It promptly became the centrepiece of the terrarium. I have no complaints about this product. The quality is great, and it looks exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: NF

customer_reviews.title: Small terrarium--you will need very small plants
customer_reviews.text: Pay attention to the dimensions. The sellers pictures and measurements are accurate and helpful, but I didn't pay enough attention. 6 inches is not large. This is a small terrarium. I bought a terrarium kit to give with this as a gift and the plants are too large to fit inside this container. Had I realized how small this terrarium is (which again, was my fault, not the sellers' fault), I would have thought that it was pretty expensive for what you get. You will not be able to fit much in here unless you are using truly miniature plants.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Terrarium Planter
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little terrarium planter. I purchased this to make a small terrarium for outside on my covered deck this summer. It is the perfect size. The seller even included a small owl figurine (very nice). The other thing I need to mention is that I purchased another terrarium planter (a bit larger) from a local craft store. I got it home and was doing a little cleaning of the glass and noticed gaps between the glass. I had to seal it with silicone. This terrarium was completely sealed and I didn't have to take that extra step. I really like the quality of this planter. I would purchase from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: LauraD

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: These are just so great! I love the shape and how it looks. I purchased for my office and love them so much that I just ordered more for my home. (All three are from same company). Many compliments
customer_reviews.author: D. Roos

customer_reviews.title: It is a good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: product arrives as scheduled; quality and look as expected. Except that between glasses there is small gaps. I was a bit concerned it might leak, either sands or water. And it did though not a main issue as long as you don't shake it or water it excessively after planting, which you shouldn't. It is a good product for the price. Will recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S. Fan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but not practical, more decorative than functional
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a terrarium. It is BEAUTIFUL! However, I'm concerned because when I handle the product, I can hear the joints straining. That makes me concerned about how long it will last. It also isn't entirely sealed, so it will leak. As pretty as it is, I don't think I would buy it again to use as a terrarium. It might be worth it if you're using fake plants or using it for some other purpose that's more decorative than functional.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will Look Great on My Coffee Table
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this terrarium! I have 5 succulents in mine and there was plenty of space for other little accessories like rocks and charcoal. I used a Terrarium Succulent DIY kit to fill out that space. The only real issue I have is that the joints look a bit cheap because of the glue, but you can see that in the pictures they provided as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler B

customer_reviews.title: So pretty!! Keep in mind it is fairly small ...
customer_reviews.text: So pretty!! Keep in mind it is fairly small but plenty enough room for small plant(s) plus decoration. Make sure to check for the owl! Almost accidentaly threw it away when I thought it was part of the wrapping but its a super cute addition!
customer_reviews.author: Casie

customer_reviews.title: It was packed so well
customer_reviews.text: It is such a cute piece and it comes with the owl. I lined the base with a little bit of plastic for the soil and water so it won’t leak. And I camouflage it some rocks and sand to tuck the plastic in. You can still see it but no big deal for me. It such a cute piece, good for gifting or for display on your desk. So perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Evey

customer_reviews.title: missing a lid
customer_reviews.text: this is a great terrarium but it is missing a lid. i decided to leave the opening on the top. some of the reviews i saw folks left the side panel as the opening. that considerably reduces the amount of space you can work with. i like seeing the roots grow so i my last layer of soil is at the middle of the terranium. i also like to decorate it with figurines and working from the top is just so much easier. I think this is a great little display terranium for your succulents but it would've been great if it came with a lid.
customer_reviews.author: simon

customer_reviews.title: Works great, looks great
customer_reviews.text: Love it works great for what I need. It doesn’t feel extremely sturdy but it’s also made of mostly glass with some metal. The water stays in enough when watering plant. I’m careful not too over water. I can tell if I dumped too much in it would spill out of some of the cracks between glass panels. This looks great for what I’m using it for. Only complaint is that the hole you have in one panel to get inside of container is kind of tight for my hands. Wish it was just a tad bigger so I had more space when planting terrarium and when watering/fertilizing.
customer_reviews.author: KTBEE

customer_reviews.title: makes a good terrarium
customer_reviews.text: The container was well constructed and made a very nice terrarium. I did seal the lower half of the container with clear silicone caulk to ensure that it is water tight.
customer_reviews.author: Suzi

customer_reviews.title: So many potential uses!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! I can see this having so many different uses and this is my second one like it. I have one that I just made into a cemetery terrarium. I'm thinking I will get a few more to hang some air plants in my macrame hangers around the house. It could also sit in a few different angles because of the geometric design. It is very sturdy and I would definitely but again!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: The craftsmanship is beautiful. The little door has a locking mechanism on ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute little glass Geometric Terrarium. The craftsmanship is beautiful. The little door has a locking mechanism on it that I did not expect. It is perfect for the small succulents I will put in it. I am hoping it will be enclosed enough for me not to have to open it. I am excited at how it looks!
customer_reviews.author: Evelina Nelson

customer_reviews.title: No water tight
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as I expected but turned out to be the perfect size for my coffee table. Watch out! It’s not water right! Either use fake plants or have something under it
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome to look at
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loves my terrarium! I bought this for a plant that outgrew the pot. It’s perfect size. It is a little hard to get a plant inside but it’s manageable. I haven’t had any issues with it either. My plant died because I was gone for a month so I’m definitely getting another plant to put inside
customer_reviews.author: Dimitri Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: small
customer_reviews.text: Although the measurements are right there in the description, I didn't realize how tiny this piece is. It's beautiful, and well made, but only holds the tiniest of plants. The opening on the side makes watering the plants a little challenging, too. Regardless, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: KSA

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and very carefully packaged and shipped
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, arrives directly from China in extremely shatter-proof packaging. Great geometrical design complements today's modern decor and it has plenty of room for an air plant display. It even comes with a cute little decorative owl! Be careful not to toss that as it's wrapped in bubble wrap and easy to miss.
customer_reviews.author: Leena C.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, you won't be disapointed
customer_reviews.text: Better than in the pictures, it's way better than I expected. Nicely made, good package as it came on styrofoam, has some gaps in between but nothing that a little bit of hot glue wont fix. Loved the little owl and it will look excellent on our new house. I will ad pictures as soon as we move in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrarium
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and surprisingly sturdy terrarium!! My cat actually knocked it off of my coffee table and it did not break!! Though I don't recommend that and it is now at my office!! Love it though and it hold my succulent garden nicely!!
customer_reviews.author: Jamiemars

customer_reviews.title: Great For a Little Terrarium
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this in addition to the Premium Kit for Small Terrarium. It's a perfect little setup in our guest bedroom to add some green. Just be careful if you have cats like us, they made it their mission to try and get inside this thing.
customer_reviews.author: SatisfiedCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Venus fly trap
customer_reviews.text: Added a venus fly trap and looks super cute. Great size for the small fly trap you can buy in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Sara H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition for our wedding centerpieces.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 15 of these for my wedding (9/30/2018). Each terrarium was carefully packaged and arrived intact. We had our florist fill the terrarium with water and place floating candles inside, which were used in conjunction with floral centerpieces for our wedding. They were perfect. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Great little terrarium
customer_reviews.text: It is just what I was looking for! I added succulent cuttings, so the plants are still kinda little. I wanted to make a little terrarium for my office, and this is perfect. I will probably buy a couple more. ~the wifey
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: We had our first wedding cake trial yesterday and bought this to go under the top tier. It looks so beautiful and inspired some more designed for the cake. It was packed well; the glass was so clean that I kept picking it up to figure out where the hole was before I finally added some spanish moss. It also came with this cute little owl figurine which now lives with some of my air plants. I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! It’s super great for a moss terrarium. It does leak if you put a lot of water into but that can be fixed if you line it with some sort of sealer! Will definitely buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: Aincrad Reborn

customer_reviews.title: Great design. Water tight
customer_reviews.text: Great little terrarium for succulents. It is water tight and holds moisture well. Really awesome modern design.
customer_reviews.author: Derrek B.

customer_reviews.title: Bought this to place in my terrarium with my Chameleon ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to place in my terrarium with my Chameleon, i place his worms in this and he is able to feed himself..... ideal size and quality, I plan to buy a few more
customer_reviews.author: nedboogie

customer_reviews.title: Not meant for live plants
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product but it killed my succulents it doesn’t have much for air flow, setting this up was a little difficult with the size of the hole. will be using this for fake plants though for decor around my home!
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie ODonnell

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Color, but Oh Well
customer_reviews.text: Well, I ordered silver, but I received gold. Now I see they only have black or gold. Anyway, it's still pretty cute and sturdy. One side is open, so it's good for a succulent terrarium.
customer_reviews.author: LauraGee

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: A perfect little display for my mini Baby (Impala from Supernatural). The edges are sealed well and held up without a hitch when I added the decorative sand and plants. That’s a Hot Wheels car in there, which shows the size. Perfect for what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: C. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy and beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Fast speedy shipping, packaged securely, the item is as described. The terrarium is beautiful in the gold finish and the swing door works and latches well. This will be a wonderful addition to some table decorations for my wedding.
customer_reviews.author: Kamehana Kato

customer_reviews.title: I love glass terrariums
customer_reviews.text: I love glass terrariums, but unfortunately the glass on this one feels a little loose (it rattles around), which makes me nervous to use it much. It is also a very "yellow gold" brass, a finish I don't care for because it looks a little cheap.
customer_reviews.author: CraftyMama

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my brought for Christmas and he really liked it. Good quality for the price, it looks like an expensive product when you have it set up.
customer_reviews.author: christy canaday

customer_reviews.title: ... made a terrarium in this and it looks really cool - the only thing is you have to be ...
customer_reviews.text: I made a terrarium in this and it looks really cool - the only thing is you have to be careful and water with a spray bottle because it's not water tight. If you pour water into it, it will leak out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and the terrarium kit I purchased for it helped to create a perfect environment for small succulent plants
customer_reviews.text: The globe planter is a welcome addition to my home. Small, yet functional, and the terrarium kit I purchased for it helped to create a perfect environment for small succulent plants. The geometric design allows for a Multi-faceted view of the plants growing within. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Golden owl!
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful just like the picture!! I bought the one with the gold lining! It came wrapped up very nicely and with a tiny owl figure!! Lol it's so cute!! I absolutely love it!! *sorry mine is a bit dusty in the pictures** it did not come that way it's just that I haven't cleaned it recently!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but guys that packing method was awful ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but guys that packing method was awful to work through :(! It did arrive safe and sound but whatever that stuff is, it flies all over your house and hides! Maybe put that stuff in a box? With less duct tape? Or An opening on the duct tape?? But thank you for the product! We are going to use is as a garden to catch a leperchaun on st pattys day
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: It's quite small.
customer_reviews.text: Dissapointed in this purchase... fits the smallest succulent you can find. Any growth and you have to transplant it asap. It's cool, but I wouldn't have purchased it at this price if I saw it first in person.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Looks fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I love the little one that came with it too! I was afraid he would look tacky and I’d end up throwing him away but he actually looks pretty cute so I kept him. The terrarium itself looks very beautiful. I don’t mind that it did leak when I watered the plant. This means that there’s drainage and I won’t have to worry about plant soup or mold.
customer_reviews.author: Aly Cat

customer_reviews.title: Love the extra space inside these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They hold more than the "tear-drop" styles and I do like the extra working space on the inside. Even while remaining small and un-obtrusive. The variety and busyness within is truly a charm!.
customer_reviews.author: Vernon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect succulent terrarium
customer_reviews.text: Perfect terrarium for a cute little succulent garden. I’m so glad I purchased this. I used faux succulents and pebbles and it turned out really nice. The owl is a cute little touch.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey S.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I can't say how much I love this little terrarium! Its cute, any very well constructed! But this, it is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Cindymac52

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and well made. It holds water, so you can lightly water your succulents inside. It looks really cute on my bathroom side table, and it came with a little owl! :)
customer_reviews.author: Denisse

customer_reviews.title: GORGEOUS & sleek
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful design! It looks gorgeous and is super sturdy. I'm currently using it as a terrarium for different stones :)
customer_reviews.author: Jean Yang

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of these for xmas presents for my admin at work.... They were perfect! Something a little different. They all enjoyed purchasing to fill the terrarium with.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Great for small surveillance camera
customer_reviews.text: I placed it in the garden with a small surveillance camera in it upside down on a brick works great looks cool
customer_reviews.author: Paul O.

customer_reviews.title: great price
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and its a bargain for the quality. I believe this is the lowest price for it on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: mike g.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but IT LEAKS
customer_reviews.text: I bought the gold and upon arrival was super excited to plant my succulents and cacti in it. It looks super cute with or without anything planted in it and comes with a small owl. The reason for my low rating is because I watered it and everything leaked out of the bottom. I have both soil and rocks in it but I still had water everywhere so I might have to do what others did and seal it my self (super inconvenient).
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: Really beautiful terrarium. Nicely made only thing is the door does not stay open, you have to prop it open. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Great for shorter succulents
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a hinged door planter because my cats tend to eat anything in a planter, so this keeps them out. Only reason I paid the extra money was for the door feature.
customer_reviews.author: Mhm

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful decor
customer_reviews.text: Love this! The only thing is it leaks! Better put a pretty fish under it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, a little small
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It's clean, unbroken and is exactly as advertised. I fit three of my five plants inside of it. It is a bit smaller than I expected (added the pen to the picture for context) but it is worth what I paid for and it's probably my fault anyway for not checking dimensions. It came packaged in styrofoam.
customer_reviews.author: M Glassley

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought ones like this before but they were really small. This one was a great addition to my coffee table. My daughter and I made a project out of it and had a ball filling it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this terrarium it is exactly what I pictured, the perfect size for my small space.
customer_reviews.author: JSHenderson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't leak looks modern
customer_reviews.text: This is such a good quality and design. Looks so nice one of my end tables or fireplace mantle
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted, just minor scratches/defects.
customer_reviews.text: I used this to display sand and shells as decoration on a bookshelf. I love the style of it and it looks great, there were just minor scratches on the glass and trim, which is why I would give it 4 stars instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, petite
customer_reviews.text: Super adorable! Not terribly big, but the pictures are accurate to show the size. I love the aesthetic. It isn’t the most sturdy, but for its price, it is absolutely appropriate.
customer_reviews.author: Dear Prudence

customer_reviews.title: Overall cute product!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and size, just hoping it isn't too big of an opening and keeps enough moisture inside for my venus flytrap. Actually pretty larefor a single root system. Might add another carnivorous plant later.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good seams, holds water
customer_reviews.text: The seams are soldered to the glass so it won't leak. Perfect for my succulents. It will hold soil, plants and water.
customer_reviews.author: snoonan711

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but too small
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful but soooooo small could hardly use my hands to get anything in it
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it, it's a very nice piece and of solid construction.
customer_reviews.text: Just an awesome piece of art I tell you! Watertight as far as I can tell. I recommend it, it's a very nice piece and of solid construction.
customer_reviews.author: Я

customer_reviews.title: Great mothers day gift! Make her a terrarium!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for mothers day and filled it with a little succulent terrarium! Moss, rocks and soil. Perfect! Nice and chic and modern. My mom loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Akopyan

customer_reviews.title: Happy with terrarium end result
customer_reviews.text: Really like how my terrarium turned out! When I first received the container I was disappointed in the silver trimming. It definitely looks like they painted over the black metal framing with clumpy with paint. However, the succulent arrangement detracts from the silver trim.
customer_reviews.author: Genia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for myself and loved it so much I decided to buy another one for my niece for Christmas. Arrived quickly and with a perfectly wrappable box!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This has been very quality! All my friends are now running to get one too. Thanks for the free owl!
customer_reviews.author: Sony Ding

customer_reviews.title: Not sealed at joints
customer_reviews.text: This is not sealed completely at the joints, so if you want to use it as a terrarium (as pictured), it will require a dish underneath for runoff. Slightly disappointed, but it's not really a bad thing that excess water can escape, so 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon R. Moody

customer_reviews.title: Only for smaller plants.
customer_reviews.text: My venus fly trap liked it so much, it outgrew it!
customer_reviews.author: BJ Reino

customer_reviews.title: Little surprise!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived wrapped very well and secure. It is very pretty and sturdier than expected! They also left a tiny decorative owl inside it as well. I actually love owls so I love the little surprise to use as decoration with my plants! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Kasarjian

customer_reviews.title: Good Size Terrarium (Great gift for plant lovers)
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for those who enjoy having succulents or airplanes. It is a beautiful terrarium for a desk or shelf to display plants. I included a picture with my hand for size reference!
customer_reviews.author: Dalena

customer_reviews.title: Lovely item
customer_reviews.text: It’s soooooo cute and it came with some little 3D sticker ladybugs/beetles that aren’t pictured in separate packaging, which I think are adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Perfect small size for my use. Made well and looks good. I put moss and 3 small plants in it. It came with ceramic owl.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and functional.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. great price, nice looking, seems sturdy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Hall

customer_reviews.title: Leaks like a sieve, but it's beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: While it's pretty, this planter leaks like a sieve. I had to transplant the plant to a different pot. I'm keeping it as a decorative object I'll put rocks and stuff inside of instead of soil and plants.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Love this !
customer_reviews.text: Love this ! Hard to find a silver version to match my silver hardware. Most of these are gold or brass.
customer_reviews.author: Mila Raye

customer_reviews.title: delicate look for delicate gardens
customer_reviews.text: We loved the whole gardening experience with the soils and plants and mediums and tools and pots
customer_reviews.author: gma linda

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase adding the terrarium plants kit
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase adding the terrarium plants kit. It looks exactly as the picture shows. Lovely on my desk or at home.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed. Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. I made a terrarium out of it. Good quality

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. But wish it was sealed. When I water my plants, the water run through
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great terrarium!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in great condition. Fits three (approx 2” ea.) succulents comfortably, and comes with a cute little owl. Seems durable!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Marie

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice just hard to arrange everything and put plants in
customer_reviews.author: Cin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I think this product looks exactly like the picture. It seems to be good quality and I’m so excited to add my succulents to it!
customer_reviews.author: JessicaD

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Well made and pretty. Would buy again. Just as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Taylor

customer_reviews.title: looks great. Good size.
customer_reviews.text: exactly what I wanted for my succulents. And it came with a cute owl to add to my 'garden'. Can hold 3 succulents without lookinf cluttered.
customer_reviews.author: Alifan

customer_reviews.title: The perfect centerpieces
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved these!! They were the perfect centerpieces for our wedding. Everyone loved them. We even turned one into a flower basket for our flower girl. So cute!
customer_reviews.author: TaLisa R.

customer_reviews.title: Size and shape are as described in the listing. ...
customer_reviews.text: Size and shape are as described in the listing. I am using it as a container for an orchid. Because there is only one open pentagon that can face straight up, it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: devin

customer_reviews.title: looks good
customer_reviews.text: fair warning mine isnt solid black, more of a brownish black. still nice, still looks great and it came with a decorative owl which i wasnt expected so thats nice too haha. id buy it again 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is well made and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It dresses up where ever you put it. Easy to use and the plants seem very happy in it.
customer_reviews.author: J. B. Burch

customer_reviews.title: Looks exactly as picture. Came in good condition.
customer_reviews.text: I really like that this has a closing door so it can be used as a semi closed terrarium. The one downside is that there are small openings at some of the joints so it is not extremely water/air tight. It seems well made and shipped in good condition. The color is a true gold, not muted.
customer_reviews.author: lukewarm penguin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent piece.
customer_reviews.text: I am quite happy with the quality of the item. I received it in a timely manner and packaged excellently.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Yerves

customer_reviews.title: Good size for a gift, fit 2 bigger and 3 smaller succulents
customer_reviews.text: It’s small enough to give as a gift and they aren’t going to struggle to find a place to put it. It seems well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute. for all my succulents. The product was really cheaply made. It doesn’t provide enough room in it to really work with if you don’t not have very small hands. You are unable to contact the company either.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This terrarium is very pretty and exactly what I was looking for, but it is not completely sealed on the edges, so the soil/sand falls out a little when you pick it up or move it. Other than that it is a very nice addition to our home decor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: .Well-made quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and I plan on buying it again. A little bit pricey but you get what you pay for. I would love to see their smaller versions and I would love if they sold wholesale if you buy bulk.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful! I used it to store my wedding bouquet.
customer_reviews.author: Cyn Gantan

customer_reviews.title: Adorable.
customer_reviews.text: Have this in my office with fake succulents "planted" in small white pebbles. Visitors frequently comment on how cute it is. Great purchase.

customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice terrarium. It is well made but a bit pricey.

customer_reviews.text: Super cute, good quality. Exactly as expected!! Would recommend. It would be a cute gift for a friend

product_meta.title: Black Glass Geometric Terrarium Container Modern Tabletop Window Sill Decor Flower Pot Balcony Planter Diy Display Box for Succulent Fern Moss Air Plants Miniature Fairy Garden Gift (No Plants)
feature_bullets: 1. Elegant glass geometric terrarium is perfect for holding plants or other objects, and can serve as a stylish and modern style centerpiece by itself.
2. Perfect display box For weddings, holidays, parties, offices, and home decor. Modern design to any space.

3. This beautiful pentagon terrarium planter is simple and versatile, creates a fashion life atmosphere, makes your life more poetic and relaxing. Fit for succulents, air plants, small plants, fern, cactus, moss, airplants, or other decorative objects. Ideal for use on shelves and windowsills. Present for family and friends
4. Made of Ultra clear sodium calcium glass, plants and decoration are not included.
